alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Laclede; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 1:24PM CDT until May 19 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Dallas County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Wright County in southwestern Missouri... Southwestern Laclede County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 124 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marshfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marshfield... Morgan... Conway... Niangua... Duncan... Phillipsburg... Twin Bridges... Elkland... Grovespring... Northview... Rader... Long Lane... Charity... Odin... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 90 and 122. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southwestern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
